divs: sighting detailsi was outside my house on flame avenue in salton city, ca admiring the amount of stars we could see that night. i noticed the object because i was scanning the sky for bright stars and planets. initially, i thought it was a star. when j noticed it moving, i thought it was a satellite. when i noticed it move very quickly, i realized it couldn't be a satellite. it picked up speed and disappeared outward into space. immediately after it did that, 2 government fighter jets flew by our house. i'm presuming due to the object. when i saw it, i was excited. when i was a 14 year old girl, i was lucky enough to witness a strange red\orange ufo above me at the park in newport beach, ca. so after this small sighting at 28 years old (and this was nothing compared to my experience as a 14 year old) i was happy and elated to have seen something remotely similar. it helps to confirm a memory that is so profound in my life and my belief system. i lost sight of the object when it flew outward, away from our planet.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Salton City
There were no other sightings in Salton City on or around June 4th 2013
Summary: I saw what I thought was a star. Noticed it moving and thought it was a satellite. Then it picked up to a very fast speed and disappeared outward into space. Immediately then, two government fighter jets flew by as well. & into space.
